title: The Lewdness of Midtown Manhattan (w/ Jenny Heaton & Jim Florentine)
description: Black Lou breaks down the holiday with his family & after a power lunch with Comedy Central executives Big Jay and Dan invite their lunch server on the show & she tells us about the lewd things offered to her being a midtown waitress. Then, we find out that Jim Florentine used to pull off the look of Big Jay's dreams.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
